name: Mythroad Platform File
summary: Learn about .MRP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MRP files are used by China Mobile phones that do not support Java. The program files are typically much smaller than .JAR Java apps, roughly one-third the size.

To install an MRP app on a phone, move the file directly to the memory card of the phone using a USB connection. Then, to complete the installation, place the files in the appropriate programs folder with the other MRP files, which may be one of the following folders: Mythroad, Mulgame, Mrapp, Games.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
